attributes.action: Continue to allow lads mags and page 3
attributes.additional_details:
The production and sale of lads mags must continue to be allowed on the high street, despite claims from feminist groups.

Shops may voluntarily use modesty shelves (rather than modesty covers) which are located as far away as is practical from childrens comics / magazines, from sweets and till points.

There is a hypocrisy evident where womens magazines and certain adverts feature men for their bodies, yet lads mags and page 3 are coming under attack from feminist groups.

Keep all forms of media for the benefit of those adults who appreciate them, whether male or female, in responsible areas where those under age will not be exposed to the images.
